pkgmetadata.longdescription: Air Quality Measurements in Spain from 2011 to 2018 // These dataset contains daily quality air measurements in Spain over a period of 18 years (from 2001 to 2018). The measurements refer to several pollutants. These data are openly published by the Government of Spain. The datasets were originally spread over a number of files and formats. Here, the same information is contained in simple dataframe for convenience of researches, journalists or general public. See the Spanish Government website http://www.miteco.gob.es/ for more information.
